name: Achoo
description:
Game made in 72h for Minijam 111, with the theme "Colors" and limitation "You Are Your Own Enemy"
Play as a chameleon who try to sneak past robots and cameras. Take advantage of your ability to blend into the background. 
But look out, unfortunately the chameleon is under the weather and sneezes often, which makes is hard to sneak around.

Controls:
Move with A/D
Jump with Space
Exit to menu with Escape
